title: Woman Fatally Stabbed Husband 140 Times With Knives, Meat Cleaver: Police - Newsweek
content:

description: Joan Burke, 61, was arrested on a first-degree murder charge after Melvin Weller was found on the floor in a pool of blood that covered more than half his kitchen.
